adventureTitle: Rainbow Bridge to the Cloud Kingdom

characterDescriptions.leader: A 7-year-old boy with short slightly messy brown hair, brown eyes, rosy cheeks
characterDescriptions.action: A 5-year-old boy with short slightly messy brown hair, brown eyes, rosy cheeks
characterDescriptions.heart: A 3-year-old girl with brown hair just past shoulders, big brown eyes, very rosy cheeks

prompts.prompt: Generate a 16:9 landscape image. A magnificent floating Cloud Kingdom in the sky, with fluffy white islands connected by a shattered rainbow bridge. In the distance, a dark massive Storm Giant made of black storm clouds and red lightning looms over a beautiful Cloud Palace with golden spires. The sky is dramatic with both golden sunlight breaking through and dark storm clouds gathering. Floating islands with waterfalls that fall into mist below. Epic fantasy atmosphere, NO characters visible, Pixar-adjacent storybook style, soft painterly rendering, children's book illustration.
